entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
